Note: Signed "M. Mahut." Date based on release date for the motion picture advertised. "Visa No.14.1404" appears on the bottom left of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Poster for the 1919 anti-war film directed by Abel Gance.  For plot summary: http://us.imdb.com/Title?0010307.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
